fixes.name: Bar Label
fixes.dax_expression: IF(SELECTEDVALUE('complaints'[Selected Product]) <> "NOT SELECTED", DISTINCTCOUNT('complaints'[Complaint ID]), BLANK())
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced ATTR([Selected Product]) with SELECTEDVALUE('complaints'[Selected Product]) to get the single selected product in the filter context; replaced [Number of Complaints] (COUNTD([Complaint ID])) with DISTINCTCOUNT('complaints'[Complaint ID]). The expression returns the distinct count only when the selected product is not "NOT SELECTED", otherwise returns blank.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references an aggregation (COUNTD â†’ DISTINCTCOUNT), so it must be created as a measure.
